item.title: Agile - 12 manifesto in short and even shorter | Management Notes
item.description: The Agile Manifesto consists of 12 principles for software development and project management. It could be understood generally but too hard to remember, so that I would like to rewrite them with my understanding in just several words: 12 Agile manifesto in short1. Customer satisfaction is on top through early and continuous delivery2. Welcome any changes, even late3. Frequent delivery running software4. Business people and developer collaboration every day5. Motivated individuals, supportive and trust them to get the job done6.
